text: José Justo Corro Silva (c. 19 July 1794 – c. 18 December 1864) was a Mexican lawyer and statesman who was made president of Mexico on March 2, 1836, after the sudden death of President Miguel Barragán. Category:1794 births Category:1864 deaths Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:People from Guadalajara
title: José Justo Corro
